name: Who Are The Doom Patrol? Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Niles Caulder.

	Doctor Niles Caulder, like Professor Charles Xavier who formed the X-Men, is a paraplegic who is confined to a wheelchair. They are both very intelligent, but where Xavier is bald, Caulder sports a head of hair and a beard!

questions.text: Before becoming Robotman, what was Cliff Steele's occupation?
questions.explanation:
Athlete.

	Cliff Steele was an athlete, but he was caught in a car crash and severely injured. His brain was put into that of a robot, and as such he had super strength and a strong body that was hard to damage.

questions.text: Which other Doom Patrol member did Elasti-Girl marry?
questions.explanation:
Mento.

	Mento joined the Doom Patrol specifically to woo Elasti-Girl. Elasti-Girl was once an actress, but now she can adjust her body size to become very tall or very small. Mento derived his mental powers from a special helmet.

questions.text: In "Teen Titans" #36, which Titans member should have joined the Doom Patrol, according to Niles Caulder?
questions.explanation:
Kid Devil.

	Kid Devil was operated upon by Doctor Caulder and Elasti-Girl in this issue; both of his lungs had collapsed! Kid Devil is noted for having been the Blue Devil's sidekick and he joined the Titans shortly after the "Infinite Crisis" storyline.

questions.text: What power does Negative Man's soul NOT have?
questions.correct: Ability to influence the actions of others
options: Ability to seperate from his body
questions.explanation:
Ability to influence the actions of others.

	Negative Man is really Larry Trainor, a pilot who was bombarded with radiation and who can have his soul leave his body for 60 seconds at a time,although this limit has not always been constant. He is barely conscious when body and soul are apart, and as such he is defenseless for that time period.

questions.text: Larry Trainor may be Negative Man, but what other Doom Patrol member was nicknamed "Negative Man"?
questions.explanation:
Fast Forward.

	Fast Forward's real name is Ted Bruder. He could see sixty seconds into the future, the same length of time that Negative Man's soul can be seperated from his body. He was dubbed "Negative Man" because of his less-than-rosy outlook on life.

questions.text: Crazy Jane has sixty-four different personalities.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Crazy Jane is actually Kay Challis, whose repeated sexual abuse at the hands of her father and others left her with fragmented personalities. Each personality has a different superpower, which makes her a valuable if unstable ally.

questions.text: Coagula was a female at birth, but later became a male.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Born a male, Clark Godwin later became a female via surgery and adopted the name Kate. She had the power to dissolve solids and coagulate liquids. That is, she could make a liquid substance solid.

questions.text: Tempest gained his powers as a result of his involvement in which military action?
questions.explanation:
Vietnam.

	Tempest was actually Samuel Clay,who discovered that he could fire blasts of energy from his hands while he was serving in Vietnam. A short-term Doom Patrol member,he was murdered by Caulder.

questions.text: Vox was shown to be a Doom Patrol member in issue #36. What previous codename has he NOT gone  by?
questions.explanation:
Gabriel.

	Vox is actually Mal Duncan, a superhero who used Gabriel's horn to open a portal to anywhere he needed to go. It later blew up in his face, damaging his vocal cords and lungs.
